doc:
Martine Pascal https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martine_Pascal 0 Martine Pascal (born 1939) is a French theatre, cinema, and television actress. She is the daughter of actress Gisèle Casadesus (1914-2017) and actor Lucien Pascal (1906–2006). Pascal was married to American-born French production designer and art director Willy Holt with whom she has two children Natalie Holt and Oliver Holt. Martine_Pascal ( born 1939 ) is a_French_theatre , cinema , and television_actress . She is the_daughter of actress_Gisèle_Casadesus_(_1914-2017_)_and_actor_Lucien_Pascal_(_1906 – 2006_) . Pascal was_married to American-born_French_production_designer and art_director_Willy_Holt with whom she has two_children_Natalie_Holt and Oliver_Holt .
